<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Black Cat Curse](/Feats.aspx?ID=1266) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Misfortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=110" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 11 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
A creature within 30 feet you can see would succeed at a save.

</column>

---

You hiss a spiteful curse at the creature. The target must reroll the triggering saving throw and use the worse result.
name: Black Cat Curse
